feed.title: ThomasFrs
feed.subtitle: A minimal, responsive, and powerful Jekyll theme for presenting professional writing.

entry.title: UwU Translator Bot
entry.summary: A Discord Bot that translates any sentence into its UwU and OwO form. UwU Translator Bot is a discord bot written in Python with discord.py module. This bot is available on top.gg. Links GitHub Top.gg Images

entry.title: Image To Text Renderer
entry.summary: The Image To Text Renderer is an app made to transform any image into text. It resizes any image to any given width and converts each pixels to a character based on its darkness. It doesn’t feature a working GUI at the moment. Links GitHub Images

entry.title: Project Euler
entry.summary: This repository is open to anyone interested in solving the Project Euler problems. I started this project in December 2021 in order to enhance my computing and mathematical skills. Links GitHub Images

entry.title: Codewars
entry.summary: This repository is open to anyone interested in solving Codewars katas. I started this project in January 2022 in order to enhance my computing and mathematical skills as well. Links GitHub Images

entry.title: Steam Market Calculator
entry.summary: The Steam Market Calculator is a small yet very useful program with a simple GUI made for calculations in the Steam Market. I have simplified three of the most common calculations made on the Steam Market. Links GitHub Images
